topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: Unified Mail Filter Interface
short_description: jumfi will provide a java based uniform mail filter interface using C, JNI and Java. It will allow mail filters build in java to be applied to multiple mail servers of similar and different design.
